content: Change the key bindings of each note.
Change the direction of incoming notes.
Determines whether or not tapping outside of incoming notes will reduce your health.
Customize the game's judgement timings.
Set the game's FPS cap. (Left or Right, Shift to go faster)
Current FPS Cap
Change your note scroll speed. Mid-song speed changes won't apply. (Left or Right, Shift to go faster)
Current Scroll Speed
Toggle pressing R to game over.
Customize parts of the gameplay HUD to your heart's content.
Drag around the score to customize its position. R to reset. Q/E to zoom. Space to pause zooming. C to generate combo.
Display accuracy information underneath the health bar.
Shows your current notes per second.
Shows how much time is left in the current song.
Display the current framerate and memory usage.
Toggle flashing lights that may cause epileptic seizures and/or eye strain.
Have a bot automatically play for you. (Scores will not be saved)
Have Girlfriend count down before the song starts.
Put your notes in the center or to the right of the screen.
Toggles an underlay for the notes. (0% is transparent, 100% is opaque)
Current Lane Underlay transparency
Reset your score save data to its defaults. This will also affect certain unlocks. (CANNOT BE REVERSED)
Reset your story save data to its defaults. This will also affect certain unlocks. (CANNOT BE REVERSED)
Deletes your save file entirely. (CANNOT BE REVERSED)
Log into your Game Jolt account to earn trophies!
Play a sound whenever you press a note key.
Current Hit Sound volume
Chooses whether or not hit sounds change depending on the note judgement that you get.
Adds a splash to any sick notes you hit!
Shows an indicator for whenever you hit the note early or late.
Toggle the game pausing in menus when it's unfocused.
Shows a count of every judgement that you get during a song.
Change the language of the game.
View the official video dub of Doki Doki Takeover!
Experience what goes wrong in an alternate ending. (Goes to GameBanana)
Choose whether or not ratings are shown during gameplay.
Make visuals smoother at the cost of performance.
Show opponent notes
Load textures through your GPU instead, reducing memory usage.
Reduce load times by caching every song on boot. (HEAVY MEMORY USAGE)
Reduce further load times in this session by caching what was enabled above.
Preload assets when going into a song to reduce stutters and freezes at the cost of load times.
Randomize the notes of you and your opponent! (Scores will not be saved)
Notes of Markov
Allow the game to make use of shaders! Disable if you experience crashes or performance issues.
Shows a customized cursor instead of your computer's cursor.
Disables effects in favor of improving performance.
Escape to save, Backspace to reset. Enter to change a keybind.
<X> is blacklisted!

Press Left to decrease by 1, or Right to increase by 1.<N>Shift will go faster, Control will go by 0.1, Alt will go by 0.01.<N>Press R to reset the selected judgement. Holding Shift will reset all judgements.
